item.title: Coding
item.description: This blog gives an example of coding in python and r and how they can be combined. The last part is useful because it shows that these languages are not fully separate but are interrelated in a way and can be used together. yeet<-c(1,3,2) yeet ## [1] 1 3 2 hw = "hello world" hw[0:11] ## 'hello world' #R code chunk library(reticulate) hi<-"Walken here!" #Python code chunk hi="Hey I'm" print(hi,r.
